mapper.select: select a.id, a.title, a.content, b.id as userid, a.categoryList, a.heart, a.postdate, a.views from board_post a, users b where categoryList=2 and a.writer=b.usernum
select a.id, a.title, a.content, b.id as userid, a.categoryList, a.heart, a.postdate, a.views from board_post a, users b where categoryList=2 and a.writer=b.usernum and a.id=#{param1}
select * from(SELECT id, LEAD(id,1,9999) OVER(ORDER BY id) AS next, LAG(id,1,9999) OVER(ORDER BY id) AS last FROM board_post where categoryList=2) WHERE id = #{param1}
mapper.update: update board_post set views=views+1 where id=#{param1}
